basics.name: Amr Yasser
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a passionate law student at Ain Shams University, set to graduate with a Bachelor of Science in Law in Spring 2025. Alongside my legal studies, I have over seven years of experience in game development using the Unity engine. I specialize in freelance game programming, creating custom solutions for various projects. My goal is to transition into a professional role in game development while leveraging my legal background for analytical problem-solving. I am always eager to learn, collaborate, and contribute to innovative projects

work.highlights: Freelance development and production of games, applications, and websites. Proficient in various programming engines such as Unity 3D and Android Studio. Skilled in different programming languages including C#, JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL.

Compiling, verifying accuracy, and sorting information to prepare source data for computer entry. Inserting customer and account data by inputting text-based and numerical information from source documents within time limits.
Converting to digital and printing documents, scientific papers, and legal documents. Research and obtain further information for incomplete documents. Scan documents and print files when needed.
